meanings.definition: A person or thing that spews or emits something forcefully.
meanings.sent1: The volcano erupted, becoming a spewers of hot lava.
meanings.sent2: The factory chimneys were the spewers of thick smoke.
meanings.sent3: The spewers of confetti at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The spewers of gossip in the office never seemed to stop.
meanings.sent5: The spewers of water from the fountain created a beautiful display.

meanings.sent1: The spewers gathered at the edge of the cliff, ready to jump.
meanings.sent2: The group of spewers made quite a mess in the park.
meanings.sent3: The spewers in the contest were all eager to win.
meanings.sent4: The spewers of seeds attracted many birds to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The spewers of bubbles floated gently in the air.
